title: Tenchi Muyou! in Love (Tenchi Muyo! In Love)
synopsis: In a dark corner of the universe, intergalactic criminal Kain breaks out of prison and destroys the Galaxy Police Headquarters. Basking in the afterglow of the terror and destruction he has caused, Kain sets his sights toward a much bigger prize waiting on Earth.
related_anime: ['Tenchi Muyou!', 'Tenchi Muyou! in Love 2: Haruka Naru Omoi']
